ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to allow Red Chris Development Company Ltd. to utilize a portion of Trail Creek for disposal of tailings from the Red Chris Mine in northern British Columbia.
